description:
Having used several weather apps before, I prefer this one over the others. This is why:
Present weather and forecast at a glance.
Colored simple graphics chart.
Easy to add/delete new locations.
Easy to change weather providers if you so wish.

Wind info is not provided at the moment (just temp. and rain). It will be perfect when it does.

All in all, I highly recommend!
summary: Great graphical app, wish I found it before!

description: Temperatures and rain in a continuous line. Weather coverage around the whole world. A color map showing radar data. Great job!

like when you hover, show a tooltip with the time.

also need to leave the accordions in the position i set them when i quit the app. i want to see sunset times without closing the map every time i use the app.

finally, the default should be the average temperature for all the providers, not crowding all 5 providers onto one screen.
This app is pretty good for its straight forward approach, easy, nice informative graphics and accurate.
Would be great if there is option to show the temperature at the tray for choosen model.
